title: RD - Domestic Terrorism at School Board Meetings & LA's Covid Mandates
itunes:title: RD - Domestic Terrorism at School Board Meetings & LA's Covid Mandates
description:
Adam and Mark link up as Mark remains in quarantine to discuss the recent expansion of the definition of terms like 'domestic terrorism' and 'hate crimes' and how those changes are coming to a school near you. They also discuss the recently passed Covid rules for the city of Los Angeles  and what Mark as a restaurateur sees as the implications of those rules. Mark also makes a bold prediction about what we'll be seeing as Californians in the next thirteen months.  

Watch this episode on YouTube at YouTube.com/ReasonableDoubtPodcast and subscribe to that channel, the exclusive home of Reasonable Doubt
